# 2023-10-10 1560 SPDC measurment 
# Temperature scan betwen 36 and 38.5 °C 
# Swapped the oven to one from IJS 
# This measurement DOES NOT inculde the coincidence stage where we seperate single photons based on polarization per channel. 
# A narrowband filter is implemented in C21 (1560.61 nm) bandwidth of 100 GHz# Each single-photon detector is connected to the coincidence stage# A SPD is connected to one branch of the coincidence stage, while the other SPD is connected directly to the V photon branch on the temp scan
# TEST MEASUREMENT# --------------------------------- 
# input laser power: 83 mW  at 780 nm (262 mA) 
# pump polarization: 'H' (Ch1, C21R)(uW)  = 82.1 mW)# periodic polling: 9.12 um# initial setup alignment at 22.0 C# integration time: 60 s 
# single photon detector darkcounts: 0.3 and 0.27 kHz 
# single photon detector QE: 10% 
# single photon detector dead time: 20 us 
# Time-delay of 86.2 ns# ---------------------------------- 
# Temperature    Clicks_1    Clicks_2    Correlations 
# [C]    [/]    [/]    [/]
